If you want a couple hours of fun or you want to play Portal 2, i would recommend Portal as it is a very nice puzzle game and helps new players learn about the lore.
Блядь, я думал какое-то модернированное дерьмо ну бля игра крутая,красивая мне очень понравилось)

Esse jogo além de funcionar em qualquer PC é muito bom, os puzzles não são tão difíceis no inicio mas ao passar do tempo vai sendo apresentado outras mecânicas que serão muito úteis para se terminar o jogo
норм игра тем более всего за 32 руб за 1 и вторую часть
Tell me a single reason not to recommend this game?
крута я игра и все) хаха
Portal is a little atmospheric gem with unique gameplay mechanic that you definitely should try to play.
More than 12 years after release date, and still Portal is playable and very fun. Highly recommend to anyone who has not tried it yet.
very fun puzzle game with intresting story. The game tells you a lot by simply adding small details in the environment.
大爱传送门系列，双人模式已通关，结局确实被吓到了，可能....我也在那里边的其中一个=v=

垂直同步要開 不然會滿暈的

솔직히 글라도스 때문에 한 게임 엉엉
A cool but very short guinea pig experience with a dark background theme and ironic humor. One of the few iconic games that everyone should try.
什么是第九艺术？这就是第九艺术
Bitirdim ve tam üzüldüm derken karakterin "sen öldüğünde ben hala hayatta olacağım" demesi....
Very good game with innovative mechanics. On sale is a good deal.
the real puzzle is who the fuck play tested the limited steps challenge
很不错的一款解密游戏

游戏画面音效不算差，现在的电脑很容易就能将这款游戏画质拉满
有一点需要注意，我一个不晕3D的人差点玩吐了，传送门摆放的位置和方向一定要看好，不然真的很晕
ed很棒！！！
1代剧情短了点，但很好玩。挑战也是真的难啊

At first I was kinda slow getting into it and I would only do a few of the puzzles at a time, but when I got to the ending part I felt the intensity build up and just powered through it in one sitting :P I like how it start off more laid back in the beginning, and even though my dumb brain would sometimes get confused at some of the puzzles, they were still fun to figure out. 

Edit: After reading some of the other review I do have to admit that I was surprised how short the game is, and if you get motion sick easily this game is definitely not got you! I don't usually get bothered like that too easily, but at certain points while flipping or turning the motion and pov of the camera would make me somewhat disoriented.
güzel bir oyun:D ama çok güzel veya şahane bir oyun değil puanım 7,1

I played through this game in the period of a couple days and its so good. Its just puzzles, but none of them are too hard or too easy so it doesn't get boring and I didn't ever get too stumped. Not only is the gameplay fun, the story is just hilarious and fun and the end credits were awesome and really appealled to myself as a science major.
Juegazo, lo he jugado ya muchas veces 10/10
I love this game but who doesn't
有趣的游戏，脑洞大开的玩法。
Un clasico, facil, pero te hace pensar igual
Juego muy bueno y de  ingenio, si buscas un shooter o algo de accion, no lo compres no tiene nada de eso, es un juego de ingenio un toque cortito pero muy bueno lo recomiendo.

Não botava fé nesse jogo, joguei por pressão de um amigo e até que gostei. É cansativo mentalmente, mas gratificante de avançar nos desafios e a história pareceu interessante, suficiente pra eu querer jogar a continuação.

Portal and portal 2 are challenging puzzle games. I love the cynicism of the computer when she speaks to you. I found more fun Portal 2 as the "playing with a friend" functionality to solve the puzzle together creates a special bond with your friend.
Я сильно тупой для этой игры,но пройти попытаюсь :D

Trama: 10/10. Jugabilidad: 10/10. Puzzles: 10/10.

No hay razón para no comprarse este juego, búscate una oferta o cómpralo sin más. Es un juego que tienes que jugar alguna vez como mínimo.

Primera vez que lo juego, 3 horas seguidas jugando y quiero seguir. Recomendado 100%
This game is pretty cool. I got it when the bundle with Portal 2 was on sale for $1.48. It's pretty fun. gamer moment 0_0
Игра понравилась своей простотой и неплохим сюжетом, рекомендую поиграть, игра не сложная.
Una Aventura Algo corta pero muy buena. Los Puzzles te hacen pensar bastante pero no son Imposibles de Realizar. Y al final te dedican una canción mientras te comes un PASTEl. 10/10
I may not have as much hours as others in this game. It's a love/Love relationship, even years later I keep going back to it.
Best Puzzle game ever, fun and Challenges your ability to problem solve
Classic and Amazing!  How have you not played this?
